name: Gun Road
detailed_description:
What is it?
Old-shool'ish trucks'n'guns action with rogue-like elements and dynamic difficulty will show you wasteland from a new angle.

Features?

  • Dynamic difficulty to offer more challenges to tough guys.
  • Different environmental modifications requires to be smart shooter in gunfights.
  • Unrepeatable procedurely generated battle situations to make game really replayable.
  • Trading system for those who like to rob within a market economy
  • 3 factions with special vehicles, different laws and traditions to become an outlaw up to three times.
about_the_game:
What is it?
Old-shool'ish trucks'n'guns action with rogue-like elements and dynamic difficulty will show you wasteland from a new angle.

Features?

  • Dynamic difficulty to offer more challenges to tough guys.
  • Different environmental modifications requires to be smart shooter in gunfights.
  • Unrepeatable procedurely generated battle situations to make game really replayable.
  • Trading system for those who like to rob within a market economy
  • 3 factions with special vehicles, different laws and traditions to become an outlaw up to three times.
short_description: Tough guy doesn't care 'bout apocalypse. While there is an old pickup and a machine gun, he will always have a job. Rob, kill, loot caravans. All the joys of the world without the law open up to you.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850 (1 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 8.1 / Windows® 10 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-2400S or 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD Radeon R9 290X or better (2 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
